Package presentation.block

Class PresentationBlock<T extends Block>

java.lang.Object
presentation.block.PresentationBlock<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionBlockPresentation, ChainConditionBlockPresentation, FunctionCallBlockPresentation, FunctionDefinitionBlockPresentation, SingleConditionBlockPresentation, SingleSurroundBlockPresentation
public abstract class PresentationBlock<T extends Block>
extends java.lang.Object
Handles the UI drawing and interaction for a given block type.
Version:
4.0
Author:
Andreas Awouters Thomas Van Erum Dirk Vanbeveren Geert Wesemael
